___name.description: The name of the domain service.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Properties of the Domain Service.

___domainName.description: The name of the Azure domain that the user would like to deploy Domain Services to.

___filteredSync.description: Enabled or Disabled flag to turn on Group-based filtered sync.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Settings for notification

___notifyDcAdmins.description: Should domain controller admins be notified.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Secure LDAP Settings

___ldaps.description: A flag to determine whether or not Secure LDAP is enabled or disabled.

___pfxCertificatePassword.description: The password to decrypt the provided Secure LDAP certificate pfx file.

___pfxCertificate.description: The certificate required to configure Secure LDAP. The parameter passed here should be a base64encoded representation of the certificate pfx file.

___externalAccess.description: A flag to determine whether or not Secure LDAP access over the internet is enabled or disabled.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Replica Set Definition

___subnetId.description: The name of the virtual network that Domain Services will be deployed on. The id of the subnet that Domain Services will be deployed on. /virtualNetwork/vnetName/subnets/subnetName.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Domain Security Settings

___syncNtlmPasswords.description: A flag to determine whether or not SyncNtlmPasswords is enabled or disabled.

___tlsV1.description: A flag to determine whether or not TlsV1 is enabled or disabled.

___ntlmV1.description: A flag to determine whether or not NtlmV1 is enabled or disabled.
